item.description:
I've gotten a few requests to plan an event at O'Connors in Worcester, so here ya go!
I checked out the web sight and the place looks great and so does the menu.
Please rsvp by noon on Friday November 7th so I can make a reservation.

There are no "Maybe's" so if you're not sure you can make it please wait till the deadline on Saturday to rsvp. As of now there is no rush to rsvp because I'm not setting a limit. If I do set a limit I'll be sure to e-mail the group.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Hostess for "Mark's meet up group"
item.name: Dinner Night. O'Connor's Restaurant & Pub
